DOC.brief_title: Multi-factorial Analysis Follicular Fluid Milieu Explore Discrepant Effect Follicular Fluid Endometrial Flushing Outcome Assisted Reproduction Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly , use seal envelops , categorize two group . Group EF include 40 woman subject FF endometrial flushing oocyte retrieval Control group include 40 woman would FF endometrial flushing . Controlled ovarian stimulation The protocol control ovarian hyperstimulation precede standard down-regulation regimen describe Chang et al. , ( 11 ) . Pituitary down-regulation evaluate determination serum estradiol ( E2 ) , LH concentration transvaginal sonography ovary . Serum E2 LH assay use commercially available competitive immunoassay Immulite Analyzer ( DPC Coat-a Count ; Diagnostic Products Corp. , USA ) Unit laboratory . All patient receive triptorelin acetate ( Decapeptyl ; Ferring , Germany ) 0.1 mg inject subcutaneously daily , begin day 21 previous cycle 1st day next cycle . If serum E2 level < 35 pg/ml , LH < 10 mIU/ml follicle > 10 mm diameter note TVS , Decapeptyl decrease half dose continued include day hCG administration . If pituitary suppress , Decapeptyl continue dose serum E2 , LH level rechecked daily suppression achieve . Patients receive hMG ( Menogon ; Ferring Pharamceutical Co , Germany ) dose 225 IU/day pituitary suppression . Gonadotrophin administer daily 6 day , dose individualize accord ovarian follicular growth . Patients monitor every day start day 6 stimulation TVS serum E2 . Intramuscular hCG ( Pregnyl ; Organon , Holland ) 10,000 IU administer least 5 follicle ≥18 mm diameter adequate serum E2 level . Progesterone measure day hCG administration . Patients divide low , moderate high responder , accord total dose hMG use day hCG injection ( 12 ) . Oocytes retrieve 34-36 h hCG administration aspirate FF collect sterile container centrifuge 600 rpm 10 min room temperature 5-ml sample supernatant obtain laboratory workup , remain amount supernatant use flush endometrium apply uterine catheter FF group discard group . Oocyte preparation For ICSI , oocyte-corona-cumulus complex assess shortly retrieval . The complex dnnuded place medium 80 IU/ml hyaluronidase 5 sec . The cumulus corona cell remove mechanically set pipette consecutive inner diameter 220 , 200 , 180 160 µm . According nuclear maturation grading , oocytes classified category , metaphase II non-metaphase II include oocyte metaphase I germinal vesicle stage . The denuded oocyte culture M2 culture medium 3-8 h , examine presence first polar body . After confirmation first polar body , ICSI perform heat stage invert microscope accord Tsai et al . ( 13 ) . All embryos score day embryo transfer developmental stage morphology , use describe criterion Steer et al . ( 14 ) good quality embryo transfer . A good-quality embryo define embryo G1 G2 grade , four blastomere day 2 ≥8 blastomere day 3 , less 20 % fragmentation , multinuclear blastomere ( 14 ) . Luteal phase support ( LPS ) start day ovum pick vaginal administration progesterone ( Prontogest 200 mg suppository . Nile Company , Pharmaceuticals , Egypt ) thrice daily 16 day continue to12 week pregnancy occur . Pregnancy diagnose measurement β-HCG level confirm later transvaginal sonography ( TVU ) clinical pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include age young 37 year , regular proven ovulatory menstrual cycle length 2635 day body mass index ( BMI ) < 35 kg/m2 , serum FSH estradiol within normal range . Indications IVF tubal pathology , unexplained infertility , male factor
